item.description: Curriculum Vitae Basic information Name: Hiramori Masahiro (平森 将裕) E-mail: mhg00g13 at gmail.com Live in: Kanagawa, Japan Language Japanese - ILR Level 5 (Native or bilingual proficiency) English - ILR Level 2 (Limited working proficiency) Employment Research Engineer, Apr. 2017 - Present Information Technology R&D Center, Mitsubishi Electric Corporation, Japan. item.title: About
item.description: Masahiro Hiramori is a SAMURAI research engineer working for industrial company in Japan. My interest is how the computer works. Interests Computer architecture Embedded system TinyML Deep learning inference framework System/performance engineering Open source software Rock climbing
